data.name: TooltipControl_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for the tooltip control

data.name: TooltipControl_Desc_Key
data.value: A customizable tooltip control that displays contextual help information with optional navigation capabilities
data.comment: Description for the tooltip control

data.name: staticTooltipContent_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for static tooltip content property

data.name: staticTooltipContent_Desc_Key
data.value: Static text content to display in the tooltip
data.comment: Description for static tooltip content property

data.name: boundTooltipContent_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for bound tooltip content property

data.name: boundTooltipContent_Desc_Key
data.value: Data-bound content to display in the tooltip
data.comment: Description for bound tooltip content property

data.name: iconType_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for icon type property

data.name: iconType_Desc_Key
data.value: Type of icon to display (info, question, warning, error)
data.comment: Description for icon type property

data.name: iconColor_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for icon color property

data.name: iconColor_Desc_Key
data.value: Color of the tooltip trigger icon
data.comment: Description for icon color property

data.name: iconSize_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for icon size property

data.name: iconSize_Desc_Key
data.value: Size of the tooltip trigger icon in pixels
data.comment: Description for icon size property

data.name: tooltipBackgroundColor_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for tooltip background color property

data.name: tooltipBackgroundColor_Desc_Key
data.comment: Description for tooltip background color property

data.name: tooltipTextColor_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for tooltip text color property

data.name: tooltipTextColor_Desc_Key
data.comment: Description for tooltip text color property

data.name: position_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for position property

data.name: position_Desc_Key
data.value: Preferred position for the tooltip (top, bottom, left, right)
data.comment: Description for position property

data.name: allowHtml_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for allow HTML property

data.name: allowHtml_Desc_Key
data.value: Enable HTML content rendering in the tooltip
data.comment: Description for allow HTML property

data.name: preserveLineBreaks_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for preserve line breaks property

data.name: preserveLineBreaks_Desc_Key
data.value: Convert line breaks to HTML br tags for display
data.comment: Description for preserve line breaks property

data.name: redirectUrl_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for redirect URL property

data.name: redirectUrl_Desc_Key
data.value: URL to navigate to when the icon is clicked
data.comment: Description for redirect URL property

data.name: openInNewTab_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for open in new tab property

data.name: openInNewTab_Desc_Key
data.value: Open the redirect URL in a new browser tab
data.comment: Description for open in new tab property

data.name: tooltipMaxWidth_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for tooltip max width property

data.name: tooltipMaxWidth_Desc_Key
data.value: Maximum width of the tooltip in pixels
data.comment: Description for tooltip max width property

data.name: tooltipMaxHeight_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for tooltip max height property

data.name: tooltipMaxHeight_Desc_Key
data.value: Maximum height of the tooltip in pixels
data.comment: Description for tooltip max height property

data.name: dummyField_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for dummy field property

data.name: dummyField_Desc_Key
data.value: Hidden field for control output requirements
data.comment: Description for dummy field property

data.name: iconType_info_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for info icon type

data.name: iconType_question_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for question icon type

data.name: iconType_warning_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for warning icon type

data.name: iconType_error_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for error icon type

data.name: position_top_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for top position

data.name: position_bottom_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for bottom position

data.name: position_left_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for left position

data.name: position_right_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for right position

data.name: Error_InvalidUrl
data.value: Invalid URL provided. Please check the redirect URL configuration.
data.comment: Error message for invalid URL

data.name: Error_NavigationFailed
data.value: Unable to navigate to the specified link. Please check the URL and try again.
data.comment: Error message for navigation failure

data.name: Error_PopupBlocked
data.value: Popup blocked. Please allow popups for this site or manually navigate to:
data.comment: Error message for popup blocked

data.name: Error_NewTabFailed
data.value: Unable to open link in new tab. Please check your browser settings or manually navigate to:
data.comment: Error message for new tab failure

data.name: Accessibility_ShowTooltip
data.comment: Accessibility label for showing tooltip

data.name: Accessibility_ShowTooltipAndNavigate
data.value: Show tooltip and click to navigate
data.comment: Accessibility label for tooltip with navigation

data.name: Accessibility_HoverForInfo
data.comment: Accessibility title for hover interaction

data.name: Accessibility_ClickToNavigate
data.value: Click to navigate or hover for more info
data.comment: Accessibility title for click navigation

data.name: PropertyGroup_Content
data.comment: Property group for content-related properties

data.name: PropertyGroup_Appearance
data.comment: Property group for appearance-related properties

data.name: PropertyGroup_Layout
data.comment: Property group for layout-related properties

data.name: PropertyGroup_Navigation
data.comment: Property group for navigation-related properties

data.name: PropertyGroup_Advanced
data.comment: Property group for advanced properties
